pages.text: The Vizier has some snazzy robes themselves, and a good looking turban too. With their Ruby, you can replicate these garments and get some of their special abilities!
You feel like you've might as well! You've already took the Evoker's style, why not move up on the world?

While taking damage while wearing the Turban, you will have a 50%, or a 100% if you're at or below half of your maximum health, of spawning a loyal Irk that will defend you. If you use the Vexing Spell while crouching, it will kill of your Irks, healing you a heart per killed.

At first, the Robe seems to be just another recolor of the Dark Robes, but when casting a spell through your wand you've discovered that doing so will give you the Vizier's shield, halving all incoming damage so long as you're spellcasting.
